text: Hello fellow developers! Do you manage caching assets somehow in HubSpot-developed pages? Styles/scripts etc. ? any additional plugins/code you add so page loads faster?

Hello,

I have a question regarding the preview of the emails in dark mode on gmail app-
For gmail app on IOS, our email appears weirdly in the dark mode. If the background of our email is dark, it appears light in the gmail app of IOS dark mode. Here's also examples attached of how it appears in Dark mode

Is there a way to fix this?

Thank you!

Hello all,

I would like to know if it's possible to create a line item editor for orders. I use workflows that contain more than the default information available for line items in orders and I need the other information that's available for deals, etc. to appear.

Is there any way to do this?

Hey all :wave:
Happy holidays!

A quick question here
Does anyone know how to check whether the cookie banner really works?

I got a message from a client saying that some marketing agency says the cookie banner on their site doesn't work.
I'm not sure what to advise them since I don't have much experience with this thing in HubSpot.
I'd appreciate it if anyone could shed some light on this. Thanks :orange_heart:

Hey <@UJAPS2K4N> :wave:
I was hoping you might know a thing or two about this :wink:

But let's ask a few other devs about this:
<@U01QVR44MEY>, <@U03REFNRMB3>, <@UDEASNWEB>, <@U25PYL3Q8>, <@U26BLKGE4>, <@UGDF9EBPW>
i can't think of anything further to add, off hand
<@UMZFZHVUJ> what do you mean by “not working”??
Are tracking cookies firing too soon ? Not firing at all ?  What?

I’ve run into this before, expecting ALL hs cookies to be removed when a user opts-out via the banner, but HS does need a few cookies active even in that state (such as hsDoNotTrack or whatever it’s called). I typically forward HS’s cookie and tracking documentation/legal pages and then have the client or “consultant” reach out to HS support themselves if that’s not satisfactory.
Do they happen to have a log file for the browser cookies? Or a website link that might be able to help us track down the issue?

I’m not sure what you mean by “work “, but anytime somebody tells me something like that and doesn’t give me any more information, I pop open an incognito window and load up the site and see if the cookie banner pops up.
Hi team, happy holidays, could you please help provide an endpoint URL for an API to receive leads from an outsource without using a HubSpot URL?
